epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security mechanisms
epics.description: Develop and implement a robust authentication system with multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure secure access to the self-service portal. This includes user registration, password management, and MFA integration to prevent unauthorized access. Additionally, build necessary security protocols to safeguard users' sensitive financial data.

epics.title: User Dashboard
epics.description: Develop a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This includes integrating with the core banking system to fetch and display relevant data, and ensuring the dashboard is intuitive, providing quick access to essential information.

epics.title: Account Management
epics.description: Build functionalities that allow users to submit account opening requests and modifications through streamlined, user-friendly workflows. Ensure these processes require minimal clicks and maintain easy navigation for a seamless user experience. Integrate these workflows with the core banking system for real-time processing and status updates.

epics.title: Notifications and Alerts
epics.summary: Implement real-time status updates and email notifications
epics.description: Develop a notification system that provides users with real-time status updates and email notifications regarding their submitted requests. Ensure that notifications are timely, accurate, and facilitate users in staying informed about their banking activities and request statuses.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Implement a system to log and maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions within the self-service portal. Ensure that this history is easily accessible and provides detailed records of user activities while maintaining data security and privacy.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.description: Design the self-service portal to be fully responsive, providing a consistent experience across various devices including desktop, tablet, and mobile phone. Test and optimize the portal for different screen sizes and ensure that all functionalities are easily accessible regardless of the device used.

epics.title: Session Management
epics.summary: Enable saving and resuming of incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement session management features that allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them later. Ensure that users can upload necessary documentation directly through the portal interface, with auto-save functionality to enhance user convenience and experience.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration
epics.summary: Integrate with the core banking system
epics.description: Seamlessly integrate the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Ensure that data flows smoothly between systems while maintaining a separate database for optimal performance and reliability. This integration should support real-time data exchange and updates.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access control (RBAC) mechanisms to ensure that users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This includes defining roles, assigning permissions, and ensuring secure access management throughout the portal.

user_stories.title: User Registration and Login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register and login securely, so that my account remains safe.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support registration, login, and secure authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can register with valid information. 2. User can login with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user has valid information, When they register, Then their account should be created.
Given a user has valid credentials, When they login, Then they should be authenticated successfully.

user_stories.title: Password Management
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to manage my password, so that I can keep my account secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support password change, reset, and recovery features.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can change their password. 2. User can reset password if forgotten.
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a user is logged in, When they change their password, Then it should be updated securely.
Given a user forgets their password, When they reset it, Then they should receive instructions to recover it.

user_stories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use MFA, so that my account has an extra layer of security.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support MFA setup and use.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can configure MFA. 2. User is prompted for additional authentication when logging in.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has enabled MFA, When they log in, Then they should be prompted for an additional authentication factor.

user_stories.title: Display Banking Products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see available banking products on my dashboard, so that I can choose what suits me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate with the core banking system to display tailored products.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User sees relevant products based on profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is on their dashboard, When it loads, Then they should see tailored products and offers.

user_stories.title: Quick Access to Information
user_stories.description: As a user, I want quick access to essential information, so that I save time.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design dashboard to provide quick access to critical information.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can access essential information quickly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is on their dashboard, When they look for information, Then it should be accessible easily.

user_stories.title: Intuitive Dashboard Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive dashboard design, so that I can navigate easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the design is user-friendly and intuitive.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User finds the dashboard easy to navigate.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is on their dashboard, When they navigate, Then they should find it intuitive and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Submit Account Opening Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to request account openings, so that I can manage my finances.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Streamlined workflow for submitting account opening requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can submit account opening requests easily.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needs a new account, When they submit a request, Then it should be processed.

user_stories.title: Request Account Modifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify account details, so that my information is up-to-date.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Streamlined workflow for account modifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can modify account details easily.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needs to update account info, When they submit modifications, Then it should be processed.

user_stories.title: Seamless Workflow Integration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless workflows, so that I experience minimal interruptions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure workflows are integrated seamlessly with the core banking system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Workflows are seamless and integrated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a workflow is initiated, When it is processed, Then it should be seamless and integrated.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates, so that I am always informed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send timely and accurate real-time status updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User receives real-time status updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a request is submitted, When the status changes, Then the user should receive a real-time update.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want email notifications, so that I can track my request statuses.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send timely email notifications for status updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User receives email notifications for status updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a request is submitted, When the status changes, Then the user should receive an email notification.

user_stories.title: Notification Accuracy
user_stories.description: As a user, I want notifications to be accurate, so that I get reliable information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure notifications reflect actual status changes accurately.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Notifications are correct and timely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a status update occurs, When a notification is sent, Then the user should receive accurate information.

user_stories.title: Log Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track my activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Log and maintain comprehensive interactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User interaction history is logged.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user performs actions, When they check history, Then their activities should be logged.

user_stories.title: Access Interaction Records
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to access my interaction records, so that I can review past actions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide access to detailed records of interactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can access detailed interaction records.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needs to review actions, When they check records, Then they should access all details.

user_stories.title: Ensure Data Security
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my interaction data to be secure, so that my privacy is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure security and privacy of user data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Interaction history is secure and private.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data privacy needs, When interactions are logged, Then security should be ensured.

user_stories.title: Desktop Experience
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a good desktop experience, so that I can use the portal on my computer.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure full functionality and design across desktop devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal works well on desktop devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, When accessed on a desktop, Then all functionalities should work well.

user_stories.title: Mobile Friendliness
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be mobile-friendly, so that I can access it on my phone.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure design and functionality across mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal is mobile-friendly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, When accessed on a mobile phone, Then it should be user-friendly and fully functional.

user_stories.title: Tablet Compatibility
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to work well on a tablet, so that I can use it on my device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure design and functionality across tablet devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal works well on tablet.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, When accessed on a tablet, Then it should be user-friendly and fully functional.

user_stories.title: Save Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can finish them later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow users to save their progress on incomplete applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can save incomplete applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, When saved, Then the user should be able to resume it later.

user_stories.title: Resume Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to resume saved applications, so that I can continue from where I left.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow users to resume saved applications easily.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can resume saved applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a saved application, When resumed, Then the user should continue from where they left off.

user_stories.title: Auto-Save Functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want auto-save functionality, so that my progress is always saved.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement auto-save to enhance user experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Applications are auto-saved.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an ongoing application, When interacting, Then it should be auto-saved.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Data Exchange
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time data exchange, so that I get the latest information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure real-time data flow between systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time data exchange is functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core banking system, When data changes, Then users see it in real-time.

user_stories.title: Performance Optimization
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be fast, so that I have a smooth experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Optimize performance for seamless integration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Integration is performant and reliable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core banking system, When accessing data, Then it should be fast and smooth.

user_stories.title: Data Reliability
user_stories.description: As a user, I want reliable data, so that I can trust the information provided.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data is accurate and reliable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is reliable.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core banking system, When data is fetched, Then it should be accurate.

user_stories.title: Define User Roles
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles, so that access can be managed effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support role definition and assignment.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Admin can create and define roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the role management feature, When accessed by an admin, Then they should define roles.

user_stories.title: Assign Permissions
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign permissions, so that users have access as per roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support assigning permissions to roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Admin can assign permissions correctly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given roles are defined, When permissions are assigned, Then users should have role-based access.

user_stories.title: Secure Access Management
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want secure access management, so that user roles are enforced correctly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure and accurate role-based access control.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Access management is secure and correct.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user roles and permissions, When accessed, Then the applied permissions should be correctly enforced.
